languages.text: "По меркам Арбитес я уже погряз в ереси, но знаете, меня не пугает их осуждение. Я служу Императору как никогда прежде, я больше не слеп и не скован, но бремя долга от осознания этого лишь сильнее давит на плечи. Так много надо сделать, чтобы защитить Коронус от бедствий и раздоров, и я сам возлагаю на себя эту миссию".

"By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."
languages.original_text: "По меркам Арбитес я уже погряз в ереси, но знаете, меня не пугает их осуждение. languages.text: 「アービトレイターの基準からすれば、私はすでに異端にどっぷりと浸かっていることになります。ですが率直に言うと、もはや彼らの非難などでは私を止めることはできません。私はかつてないほどに皇帝に仕えています。もはや盲目でもなければ、鎖に繋がれてもいません。だがその気づきは、かえって職務の重荷をさらに増すばかりです。このエクスパンスを災厄と争乱から守るために、なすべきことはあまりにも多い。だがそれこそが、私自身が自らに課した使命なのです」
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターの基準からすれば、私はすでに異端にどっぷりと浸かっていることになります。ですが率直に言うと、もはや彼らの非難などでは私を止めることはできません。私はかつてないほどに皇帝に仕えています。もはや盲目でもなければ、鎖に繋がれてもいません。だがその気づきは、かえって職務の重荷をさらに増すばかりです。このエクスパンスを災厄と争乱から守るために、なすべきことはあまりにも多い。だがそれこそが、私自身が自らに課した使命なのです」

languages.text: "Gemäß Arbitratoren-Standards stehe ich bereits bis zu den Knien in Ketzerei, aber ganz ehrlich, ihre Verdammung kümmert mich nicht. Ich diene dem Imperator, wie ich ihm noch nie gedient habe, ich bin nicht länger blind und gefesselt – aber diese Erkenntnis macht die Bürde der Pflicht nur noch schwerer. Es muss so viel getan werden, um die Ausdehnung vor Katastrophen und Zwietracht zu schützen, aber das ist nun einmal die Mission, die ich mir auferlegt habe."
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß Arbitratoren-Standards stehe ich bereits bis zu den Knien in Ketzerei, aber ganz ehrlich, ihre Verdammung kümmert mich nicht. Ich diene dem Imperator, wie ich ihm noch nie gedient habe, ich bin nicht länger blind und gefesselt – aber diese Erkenntnis macht die Bürde der Pflicht nur noch schwerer. Es muss so viel getan werden, um die Ausdehnung vor Katastrophen und Zwietracht zu schützen, aber das ist nun einmal die Mission, die ich mir auferlegt habe."

languages.text: « Si l'on se fie aux standards des arbitrators, j'ai déjà largement succombé à l'hérésie, mais, à vrai dire, cette condamnation ne me décourage aucunement. Je n'ai jamais aussi bien servi l'Empereur qu'aujourd'hui. Je ne suis plus aveuglé ni menotté. Cependant, cette réalisation ne rend mon fardeau que plus pesant. Il y a tant à faire pour protéger les Étendues du désastre et des conflits... Mais telle est la mission que je me suis imposée. »
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'on se fie aux standards des arbitrators, j'ai déjà largement succombé à l'hérésie, mais, à vrai dire, cette condamnation ne me décourage aucunement. Je n'ai jamais aussi bien servi l'Empereur qu'aujourd'hui. Je ne suis plus aveuglé ni menotté. Cependant, cette réalisation ne rend mon fardeau que plus pesant. Il y a tant à faire pour protéger les Étendues du désastre et des conflits... Mais telle est la mission que je me suis imposée. »

languages.text: «Para los Arbitrator soy un hereje de la peor calaña, pero a decir verdad su censura no me preocupa. Sirvo al Emperador como nunca le había servido antes; ya no estoy ciego ni maniatado, y al ser consciente de ello, la carga del deber es mucho más pesada. Proteger la Extensión del desastre y el conflicto es una ardua labor, pero tal es la misión que me he impuesto a mí mismo».
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."

traits.locale_text: «Para los Arbitrator soy un hereje de la peor calaña, pero a decir verdad su censura no me preocupa. Sirvo al Emperador como nunca le había servido antes; ya no estoy ciego ni maniatado, y al ser consciente de ello, la carga del deber es mucho más pesada. Proteger la Extensión del desastre y el conflicto es una ardua labor, pero tal es la misión que me he impuesto a mí mismo».

languages.text: “如果按照法务官的标准，我已经深陷异端邪说之中，但老实说，我根本不在乎他们如何谴责我。我心中对帝皇的忠诚，从来没有像现在这样坚定不移。我不再盲目，也不再束手束脚，而当我意识到了这一点时，我只感觉到肩上的负担更加沉重。为了守护科罗努斯扩区，我们还有太多事情要做，但这正是我赋予自己的使命。”
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."

traits.locale_text: “如果按照法务官的标准，我已经深陷异端邪说之中，但老实说，我根本不在乎他们如何谴责我。我心中对帝皇的忠诚，从来没有像现在这样坚定不移。我不再盲目，也不再束手束脚，而当我意识到了这一点时，我只感觉到肩上的负担更加沉重。为了守护科罗努斯扩区，我们还有太多事情要做，但这正是我赋予自己的使命。”

languages.text: "Yargıcı ilkelerine göre zaten dizlerime kadar kâfirliğe batmış durumdayım ancak açıkçası kınanma hissiyatı beni asla caydırmıyor. Ömrüm boyunca İmparator'a hiç bu kadar hizmet etmemiştim. Artık kör değilim, zincirlerimden de kurtuldum. Fakat bu farkındalık, görev yükünü ağırlaştırmaktan ileri gidemiyor. Enginlik'i felaketten ve çatışmadan korumak için yapılması gereken daha çok şey var. Bu görevi üstlenmeyi ise ben seçtim."
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı ilkelerine göre zaten dizlerime kadar kâfirliğe batmış durumdayım ancak açıkçası kınanma hissiyatı beni asla caydırmıyor. Ömrüm boyunca İmparator'a hiç bu kadar hizmet etmemiştim. Artık kör değilim, zincirlerimden de kurtuldum ama bu farkındalık, görev yükünü ağırlaştırmaktan ileri gidemiyor. Enginlik'i felaketten ve çatışmadan korumak için yapılması gereken daha çok şey var fakat bu görevi üstlenmeyi ben seçtim."

languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me. I serve the Emperor as I have never served before; I am no longer blind and shackled — but this realisation only makes the burden of duty heavier. So much needs to be done to protect the Expanse from disaster and strife, but such is the mission I have imposed upon myself."
